## How SMU's Backcourt Stacks Up Against Louisville's Elite Guards
The highly anticipated matchup between SMU and No. 20 Louisville is set to feature a thrilling showdown between two of the most elite backcourts in the ACC. As the Mustangs prepare to face off against the Cardinals, fans are eagerly anticipating the battle between these two highly skilled teams. In this article, we'll take a closer look at the key players and stats that will determine the outcome of this marquee matchup.
